game.name: Run Pixie Run
game.description:
Running games always come with some extra fun possibilities. This brand new adventure challenge features fabulous gameplay, simple controls and colorful graphics would definitely be enough to keep you glued to the screen. You have to run through the lush jungle while avoiding multiple obstacles in Run Pixie Run. Try to collect as much useful tools and items to boost your pixie power and run like a speed man! It is time to show your intense abilities and talents to this world. 

Do not bother about the unique challenges and difficulties as if you are enough capable to handle them if play wisely. Try to make this little and cute monster jump and fly properly so that he can cover the maximum distance in this free online running game! It is up to you to make the adventure of this little pixie special. Do everything ranging from running, jumping and flying to help him go as long as you can! Avoid being crashed with the obstacles to stop you from moving forward in this html5 endless runner!

You will have all the sufficient powers to explore some good great things in this brand new adventure challenge. Try not to get his mission failed before you do something big for him! He relies on your abilities and is pretty sure that you will help him sail through all the obstacles and create the best score today. You can play this running game created with the help of html5 technology, which makes it playable on all modern browsers and devices, no download required.
